notebooks.name: Variance Analysis Report
notebooks.description: Analyzes variances between periods, identifies significant changes in account balances, and generates detailed variance reports with explanations and drill-down capabilities.

outputs.name: Variance_Analysis_{month}_vs_{comparison}.xlsx
outputs.description: Detailed variance report with period comparisons

requires: Trial Balance data for current and comparison periods

notebooks.name: Balance Validation Report
notebooks.description: Validates that debits equal credits for each fund, checks account balance consistency, identifies out-of-balance conditions, and generates validation reports with reconciliation details.

outputs.name: Balance_Validation_{date}.xlsx
outputs.description: Validation report with debit/credit checks and reconciliation

requires: Trial Balance CSVs for selected period

notebooks.name: Reconciliation Report
notebooks.description: Performs inter-company reconciliation, eliminates duplicate entries, matches transactions across funds, and generates comprehensive reconciliation reports.

notebooks.name: Monthly Month-End Data Consolidation
notebooks.description: Loads all files from target folder, consolidates target columns, extracts unique data, and creates a monthly column for month-end data consolidation and reporting.

outputs.name: Monthly_Consolidation_{date}.xlsx
outputs.description: Consolidated monthly data with unique records

requires: Source data files in target folder
